name: Inner & Outer Mechanisms 7: Diamond Scaffolds
description:
There are currently 7 'Inner & Outer Mechanisms' drawings in physical existence. This is, at the moment, the last.

This image is a scanned copy of the original 'Inner & Outer Mechanisms 7: Diamond Scaffolds'.

The 'Inner & Outer Mechanisms' series of isometric drawings consist of groundbreaking isometric patterns, probably not seen before their inception.

They are rare because of this simple fact, and you could indeed be witnessing a piece of artistic history.

For the first time, this drawing has been put on the internet as an NFT.

Here it is, on HEN.

This drawing was made between the dates: 22/08/2020 and 24/08/2020
